channel.title: Shops! will not add items! please help!
channel.description: okay so i want to add an item to my barb assault shop because it uses a point system. there is already 3 items in the shop. but when i try to add 4 items to the shop it will not show up. and for my other shops it works. and if i edit a 1 of the 3 items into a different item it works. anyone know what to do? I really need help with this. :confused: :confused:

item.title: Shops! will not add items! please help!

item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

witch file would that be? in my shops file i see the shop and the items.

item.title: Shops! will not add items! please help!
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Maybe because it uses point system to buy you must edit a different file to allow more then 3 items to that shop.
